channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @BenYehudaPress @sillyhead I just checked, and it turns out that Other Covenants hails from a works where a BYP title features three references to dogs (two of which describe eyebrows) but none to cats.
item.source:markdown: @BenYehudaPress @sillyhead I just checked, and it turns out that Other Covenants hails from a works where a BYP title features three references to dogs (two of which describe eyebrows) but none to cats.

item.description:
@froomkin Meanwhile my Beloved Conservative Relative is still convinced (and emailing people) that “antifa” are the new “Brownshirts.”

@froomkin I doubt he knows anything about the reported role of the Proud Boys on 1/6 and their connections to the WH.

@froomkin It would be really nice if the Dems were to divert a few of the hundreds of millions they plan to pay for television ads to help us denazify our relatives.
@lavietidhar So, Rothian?
item.source:markdown: @lavietidhar So, Rothian?

item.description: @AvBronstein @JBSTVORG @RepLizCheney @AdamKinzinger The role of Tzipora will be played by Marilyn Monroe.
item.source:markdown: @AvBronstein @JBSTVORG @RepLizCheney @AdamKinzinger The role of Tzipora will be played by Marilyn Monroe.

item.description: @BenYehudaPress Would that be a picture of in-flight space shuttle repair? Or of satisfied pater familias Baruch Spinoza? Or of David and Goliath in warm embrace?
item.source:markdown: @BenYehudaPress Would that be a picture of in-flight space shuttle repair? Or of satisfied pater familias Baruch Spinoza? Or of David and Goliath in warm embrace?

item.description: @MmichaelLlucy @bruces I’m with you. Except: Much of contemporary “machine learning” is just simple linear algebra on a hundred thousand 700-dimensional matrices.
item.source:markdown: @MmichaelLlucy @bruces I’m with you. Except: Much of contemporary “machine learning” is just simple linear algebra on a hundred thousand 700-dimensional matrices.

item.description: @zachottenstein @DBashIdeas @JewishBook Ah. So that’s what that minivan picture he posted earlier was.

item.description: @joshtpm My understanding is that it scares the women from the yard, thereby raising the average testosterone level.

item.description: So few appreciate that Jurassic Park was a cautionary tale about flightless dinosaurs, not venture-capital funded science gone amok. https://t.co/yQbmQzGSLC

item.description:
@JamesFallows @WallySierk No defense lawyer to argue against seating a former White House official….

@JamesFallows @WallySierk And who better than a speechwriter to indict a president who went dangerously off-script?

item.description:
So here the excellent Bill Pascrell is doing standard constituent service for a high profile district resident with high aspirations. https://t.co/r0tq11qcpu

I’ll miss being only two blocks from his district when redistributing takes effect.
item.source:markdown:
So here the excellent Bill Pascrell is doing standard constituent service for a high profile district resident with high aspirations. https://t.co/r0tq11qcpu
I’ll miss being only two blocks from his district when redistributing takes effect.

item.description: @PascrellforNJ @JohnFetterman I appreciate your support for a Cliffside Park resident. A model of constituent service. I’ll miss being only two blocks outside your district.
item.source:markdown: @PascrellforNJ @JohnFetterman I appreciate your support for a Cliffside Park resident. A model of constituent service. I’ll miss being only two blocks outside your district.

item.description: @joshtpm This is just constituent service on Pascrell’s part: Cliffside Park is in his district.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm This is just constituent service on Pascrell’s part: Cliffside Park is in his district.

item.description:
Today -- Wednesday, June 27 -- marks the 366th anniversary of Baruch Spinoza’s excommunication by the Amsterdam Jewish community. https://t.co/pGjAXcFIes

But what if, instead of finding deep theological questions that undermined traditional Jewish belief, the 23-year-old had found true love in the person of a young widow from a Lithuanian shtetl?

To find out what might have happened, you'll have to read of “A Face That Launched a Thousand Ships,” a story by Milton Verskin slated to appear in “Other Covenants: Alternate Histories of the Jewish People.” https://t.co/AZ9807VKSg

Which is your reminder: If you haven't yet pledged for a copy of Other Covenants on Kickstarter, time is running out! https://t.co/EsaEUeqFp0
item.source:markdown:

To find out what might have happened, you'll have to read of “A Face That Launched a Thousand Ships,” a story by Milton Verskin slated to appear in “Other Covenants: Alternate Histories of the Jewish People.” https://t.co/AZ9807VKSg
